Menu voices: default.Text:
This is the Adventure mode
where you can play through the story.

This is the Trial mode
where you can play one stage at a time.
How to play as E-102 Gamma.
Explanation of the action stages rules.

This is the Options screen.
You can change settings here.

This is the Sound Test.
You can listen to the background music.
The memory card is not ready.

There is no free space
in the memory card.

Menu voices: Sonic.Text:
ADVENTURE MODE.
You can play through the story in this mode.

TRIAL MODE.
You can play one stage at a time
HOW TO PLAY WITH ME, SONIC.
HOW TO PLAY WITH E-102 GAMMA.

HOW TO CLEAR THE GAME.
You must know it, or you won't clear the game!

OPTIONS.
Choose the features you want to edit.

SOUND TEST.
You can listen to cool sounds here.

Make sure your memory card
is set correctly.

Hey! You don't have enough space
in the memory card.

Menu voices: Eggman.Text:
This is the Adventure mode
where you can fight against me.
Who would you like to play as?
How to play as that accursed Sonic.
How to play as that fox boy, Tails.
How to play as that fool, Knuckles.
How to play as that little girl, Amy.

How to play as my servant,
E-102 Gamma.

How to play as that fat cat,
Big or whatever.

Explanation of the action stages rules.
Finish reading and start the game already!
What stage are you going to play?
What mini game are you going to play?

Options screen.
So, change any setting you'd like.

Sound Test.
You can listen to various songs here.
Is your memory card set correctly?

The memory in your memory card
is used for something else.

Idle: Station Square (station area).Text:
So this station is
the center of the city?

A city with an ocean view
is so awesome!

I wonder if there are
any fish here too...

Idle: Station Square (city hall area).Text: This area has changed a lot too...
I feel uncomfortable in a city.

Idle: Station Square (sewers).Text: This makes me feel like a rat.

Idle: Station Square (Twinkle Park entra.Text: Places like this are not really my thing.

I don't think I can
get into the amusement park.

Idle: Station Square (hotel).Text: Hey-hey! This is not the time to rest!
This hotel... I'm a little jealous.
I'd love to stay at a hotel like this!

Idle: Station Square (casino/station).Text:
Uh-oh! There's no time for
playing around in a place like this!
Train heading to Mystic Ruins confirmed.

Idle: Mystic Ruins (station area).Text:
This area sure has changed
after they built the station.

I've got to hurry
and restore the Master Emerald.
I don't really like places like this...
I wonder where Froggy might be...

Idle: Mystic Ruins (Angel Island).Text:
I've got to hurry and bring
this island back to the sky...

Idle: Mystic Ruins (jungle).Text: Now this is more like it!
Which way did I come from?

This place...
It makes me feel nostalgic somehow.

Temperature increasing.
Forced cooling mode 1: start.

Idle: Past (normal).Text:
Corresponding data not found.
Unable to determine current location.

Idle: Egg Carrier (outside).Text:
To think that such a thing
could fly in the sky...

Why would he create
something like this...
How does this ship fly, I wonder?

Idle: Egg Carrier (inside).Text:
Ghh... He doesn't even try to hide
his tastes from the shipmates!
Someday I will create a ship like this too!

Let's walk quietly
so we don't get spotted.

Idle: Emerald Coast.Text:
Guess I should just
go along the coastline.

Idle: Windy Valley.Text: I can hear the wind in the distance.

Idle: Casinopolis.Text:
What a terrible smell...
Is this a garbage dump?

Idle: Icecap.Text: It's like a world of ice...
Gonna pull off some cool moves!
Time to slide down, I guess.

Idle: Twinkle Park.Text:
This must be the entrance
to the kart course.
Looks like there's nobody around here.

I'm looking forward
to seeing what I can fish out.

Idle: Speed Highway.Text: Hey-hey, there's no time to play around!
The cars look like they're not moving!

The Emerald pieces must be
somewhere in this city.

Idle: Red Mountain.Text: Where did the Egg Carrier go?
Eeh... I'm finished if I fall into the lava.
If I fall off this cliff, I'm a goner.

Idle: Sky Deck.Text: Phew... If I fall off here, I'm finished.

It's so high...
My legs are feeling numb!

Hey-hey, what the heck
is up with this ship?

Idle: Lost World.Text:
The Emerald pieces
should be in this room.

Idle: Final Egg.Text: Ehh... What a terrible oil smell...
Birdie, let's cheer up and go!

Idle: Hot Shelter.Text: I wonder if Froggy is okay.
Man... Which way should I go now?

Idle: Sonic's bosses.Text:
What's up with this guy?
Is he invincible?
No matter what you do, it's useless!
Hey! This time you're not getting away!
NOT SO BAD! Not bad at all!

Idle: Tails' bosses.Text: I can do this by myself!

Idle: Knuckles' bosses.Text: He really doesn't know when to give up!
This time... I'll finish you off!

Idle: Amy's boss (Zero).Text: I won't let you get away with this!

Idle: Super Sonic.Text:
I'll show you
the true power of the Emeralds!

Idle: Chao Garden (Sonic).Text: Yo! Have you guys been good?

Idle: Chao Garden (Tails).Text: I feel relieved when I come here.

Idle: Chao Garden (Knuckles).Text: I guess there are no Emeralds here...

I feel like...
I've met these guys somewhere...

Being here reminds me of
my homeland for some reason...

Idle: Chao Garden (Amy).Text: Aaah... It feels so nice here...
If only Sonic was here with me...

Idle: Sand Hill.Text: SHOOT! I got sand in my eyes!

This sand is so soft
and easy to slide on!

Sky Chase 2 (before transformation).Text:
All right, we managed to break through
the first line of defense!

Sky Chase 2 (transformation alt lines).Text:
All right, we managed to break through
the first line of defense!

Tails' stages - Sonic's voices.Text: Good job, Tails! Keep it up!

Tails, you have no rings!
Be careful!

Speed Highway (Tails) - Eggman's voices.Text: You think you can keep up with me?
I'm going to destroy this whole city!

You're a hundred years too early
to defeat me!

Final Egg.Text:
Destroy the targets,
and you'll get extra time.

Bosses: Eggman.Text:
Whoo-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!
Sonic, try to reach me!

Announcers: Station Square.Text:
Dear passengers! Please take your seats
and wait for departure.

Dear passengers! Please take your seats
and wait for departure.

The train headed for the Mystic Ruins
will be departing soon.

The train headed for the Mystic Ruins
will be departing soon.

A train will be arriving soon.
Please stand back!

A train will be arriving soon.
Please stand back!
No trains are currently in service.
No trains are currently in service.

Announcers: Mystic Ruins.Text:
Dear passengers! Please take your seats
and wait for departure.

The train headed for Station Square
will be departing soon.

A train will be arriving soon.
Please stand back!
No trains are currently in service.

Gameplay voices: Sonic.Text:
HEY GUY!
I'll play with you some other time!

Gameplay voices: Knuckles.Text: Hmph, all bark and no bite.

Gameplay voices: Amy.Text:
If I do something,
I take it seriously!

Gameplay voices: Big.Text: Next time I'll do my best.

Cutscene: after Emerald Coast (Gamma).Text: This frog is the one we want!
My frog is the right one!

Beta restores: Big's unused fishing line.Text:
Almost got it!
Okay, once more.

Beta restores: Final Egg 1 (Sonic) inter.Text:
Intruder alert! Intruder alert!
Egg Keepers, report to battle stations!

Intruder alert! Intruder alert!
Egg Keepers, report to battle stations!

Beta restores: Sky Deck unused lines.Text:
Strong wind approaching.
Strong wind approaching.

Descending into the clouds.
Slow the ship down.

Descending into the clouds.
Slow the ship down.

You insolent hedgehog!
I'll shake you off!

Beta restores: Perfect Chaos unused Tika.Text:
You need rings to stay as Super Sonic.
Be careful!
